# Meelo Evaru Koteeswarudu (film)

| image          = Meelo Evaru Koteeswarudu film poster.jpg

| director       = E. Satti Babu
| producer       = K. K. Radhamohan

Meelo Evaru Koteswarudu () is a Telugu Film directed by E. Satti Babu and produced by K. K. Radhamohan starring Naveen Chandra, Shruti Sodhi, Murali Sharma, Prudhviraj and Saloni Aswani among others. The film was released on 16 December 2016.
Cast
* Naveen Chandra as Prashanth
*Shruti Sodhi as Priya
*Prudhviraj as Variation Star Veera Babu
*Saloni Aswani as Samantha
*Jaya Prakash Reddy as An actor who acted as Father character of hero
*Posani Krishna Murali as Tatha Rao
*Murali Sharma as A.B.R, Priya's father
*Raghu Babu as roldgold Ramesh, Film Director
*Prabhas Sreenu as Production Manager
*Chalapathi Rao
*Dhanraj as Dhanraj, Prashant 's friend
*Pilla Prasad
*Saana
*Vidyullekha Raman as Priya's friend
Production
The first schedule of the movie started in mid 2016, and few pictures and teaser of the movie floated on the internet.
Soundtrack
Audio of the movie was released on 19 October 2016..The soundtrack and background score were composed by Sri Vasanth.The audio rights of the soundtrack were purchased by Aditya Music.
